title.narrative: Research to understand the culture of corruption in Latin America

description.narrative: Using UK expertise, the project ran three pilots looking at areas of corruption in public services and construction sectors across three Latin American countries. This worked to reduce corrupt practices and strengthen processes throughout the supply chain and scope how best the UK can develop support to other countries in these areas. This will help create a level playing field for international and British businesses.
